statements: SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, issue_description FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT participant_name FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE issue_description LIKE '%conflict%';
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_cases ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT participant_name, issue_description, resolution_status FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%' AND resolution_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_cases ORDER BY case_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT participant_name, issue_description FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE resolution_status='Pending' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE issue_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT case_id, participant_name FROM conflict_resolution_cases ORDER BY participant_name ASC
SELECT MAX(case_id) AS max_case_id FROM conflict_resolution_cases
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT name, role FROM Participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT name, role FROM Participants WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM ConflictIssues WHERE resolution_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Participants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, name, role FROM Participants WHERE participant_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT p.name, c.description FROM Participants p JOIN ConflictIssues c ON p.participant_id = c.participant_id WHERE c.resolution_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM ConflictIssues WHERE description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY issue_id ASC;

SELECT p.name, COUNT(c.issue_id) AS total_issues FROM Participants p LEFT JOIN ConflictIssues c ON p.participant_id = c.participant_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING total_issues > 2 ORDER BY total_issues DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT resolution_details FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_id = 1;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM issues WHERE participant_id = 3 ORDER BY issue_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants JOIN issues ON participants.participant_id = issues.participant_id JOIN resolutions ON issues.issue_id = resolutions.issue_id WHERE participants.participant_name = 'Alice'
SELECT participant_name, issue_description FROM participants INNER JOIN issues ON participants.participant_id = issues.participant_id WHERE participants.participant_name LIKE 'B%'

SELECT participant_name, issue_description, resolution_details FROM participants JOIN issues ON participants.participant_id = issues.participant_id JOIN resolutions ON issues.issue_id = resolutions.issue_id ORDER BY participants.participant_name DESC
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_details LIKE '%important%' AND issue_id IN (SELECT issue_id FROM issues WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28')
SELECT COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM participants
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT id, name, email FROM participants WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT p.name, i.description, r.resolution_date FROM participants p JOIN issues i ON p.id = i.participant_id JOIN resolutions r ON i.id = r.issue_id;
SELECT c.case_name, r.resolution_date FROM cases c JOIN resolutions r ON c.resolution_id = r.id WHERE r.resolution_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT participants.name, issues.description FROM participants INNER JOIN issues ON participants.id = issues.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT cases.case_name, resolutions.resolution_date FROM cases INNER JOIN resolutions ON cases.resolution_id = resolutions.id ORDER BY resolutions.resolution_date DESC;

SELECT participants.name, cases.case_name FROM participants INNER JOIN issues ON participants.id = issues.participant_id INNER JOIN cases ON issues.id = cases.id WHERE participants.email LIKE '%@example.com%';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases, participants.name FROM cases INNER JOIN resolutions ON cases.resolution_id = resolutions.id INNER JOIN issues ON resolutions.issue_id = issues.id INNER JOIN participants ON issues.participant_id = participants.id GROUP BY participants.name ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants
SELECT participant_name, participant_id FROM participants
SELECT resolution_name, details FROM resolutions
SELECT issue_name, description FROM issues
SELECT case_id, progress_status FROM case_progress
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT issue_id, issue_name, description FROM issues WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT resolution_name, details FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_name DESC;

SELECT c.case_id, p.participant_name, i.issue_name, r.resolution_name FROM case_progress c JOIN participants p ON c.participant_id = p.participant_id JOIN issues i ON c.issue_id = i.issue_id JOIN resolutions r ON c.resolution_id = r.resolution_id WHERE c.progress_status = 'Pending';
